alert.note: Alert for Alcona; Alpena (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 8:43PM EDT until June 25 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Alpena County in northern Michigan... Western Alcona County in northern Michigan... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 843 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barton City, or 8 miles north of Glennie, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... The Town Of Hubbard Lake, Ossineke Township, Curran, Hubbard Lake, Barton City, Spratt, Fletcher Pond, Devils Lake, Milen Township and Mitchell Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
